ref: 8552 pratigamana n. ʻ return ʼ R. [Cf. pratyāgamana -- n. ʻ coming home again ʼ MBh., prátigacchati ʻ goes to meet ʼ RV., ʻ goes home ʼ MBh., Pa. paṭigacchati gēhaṁ ʻ leaves one's home ʼ. -- √gam]
Pk. paḍigamaṇa -- n. ʻ turning back ʼ;
Ku. palūṇ ʻ the second going of the bride to husband's house ʼ.
